<title level="1" right="Action">[Automaton Aim](/Actions.aspx?ID=903) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 36</row>

</column>

---

You steady your body and observe the events of the battlefield to maximize the range of your next shot. You reduce the penalty for firing into your weapon's second [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) from –2 to 0 for the next ranged attack you make this turn. You can use this action a second time in the same turn to reduce the penalty from firing into your weapon's third range increment from –4 to 0 for the next ranged attack you make this turn.
name: Automaton Aim
